pls pls pls can sumone give me a step by step guide   2 how toInject 2.0 topology with xbox backup creator pls

Open the xbox backup creator (the one in the folder)
go to "image tools"tablet
choose in the right "inject"
click the "ap25 sector and load the iso of ff 13-2(yes the patched one with the topology data)
Then load the topology data which i give in folder

If all go well at the bottom of the program we will see:
Injecting Sector
   Xbox Format Version = Xbox360 XGD3
   AP25 Sector file injected at LBA sector 16608
